TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi NavigationWindow extends System.Windows.Window implements class System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext
Public Class NavigationWindow Inherits Window Implements IUriContext
public ref class NavigationWindow : System::Windows::Window, System::Windows::Markup::IUriContext
type NavigationWindow = class inherit Window interface IUriContext

summary.span: 表示支援內容巡覽的視窗。

span.span: Represents a window that supports content navigation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生自並將它擴充，能夠瀏覽至並顯示內容。 derives from and extends it with the ability to navigate to and display content. 內容可以是任何.NET Framework 物件或 HTML 檔案。Content can be any .NET Framework object or HTML file. 不過，一般物件是以瀏覽的套件內容的慣用的方法。In general, however, a object is the preferred way to package content for navigation. 內容可以瀏覽至藉由設定屬性與所需內容的 URI。Content can be navigated to by setting the property with the URI for the desired content. 此外，內容可以瀏覽至使用其中一個的下列多載方法：Additionally, content can be navigated to by using one of the following overloads of the method: - - 當內容巡覽至的 URI，會傳回包含內容的物件。When content is navigated to by URI, will return an object that contains the content. > [!NOTE] > 瀏覽 uri 也支援導覽至內容片段。Navigation by URI also supports navigation to a content fragment. 請參閱 。See . 或者，內容可以瀏覽至使用其中一種接受物件的方法多載：Alternatively, content can be navigated to by using one of the method overloads that accepts an object: - - 瀏覽的存留期可以追蹤透過下列事件：The lifetime of a navigation can be tracked through the following events: - - - - - - - .. 發生巡覽; 每次引發並不是所有的事件所引發的事件集的取決類型 （內容或內容片段），就會發生的瀏覽和巡覽完成的方式 （已取消、 已停止或失敗）。Not all events are raised each time that a navigation occurs; the set of events that are raised is determined by the type of navigation that occurs (content or content fragment) and how the navigation completes (canceled, stopped, or failed). 下圖說明在其中將會引發這些事件的順序：The following figure illustrates the sequence in which these events will fire: ![頁面巡覽流程圖](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "頁面巡覽流程圖")![Page navigation flow chart](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "Page navigation flow chart") 期間或之後的瀏覽提供之內容所要巡覽，包括正在巡覽之內容的 URI 的相關資訊 ()，目前內容的 URI ()，和包含的物件若要巡覽的內容 ()。During or after a navigation, provides information about the content that is being navigated to, including the URI of the content being navigated to (), the URI of the current content (), and an object that contains the content that was navigated to (). 當內容巡覽巡覽記錄中記錄的導覽中的項目。When content is navigated to, records the navigation as an entry in navigation history. 項目會加入向後巡覽記錄，其中一個新的瀏覽發生時，藉由呼叫方法，或瀏覽至向前巡覽記錄中的項目，藉由呼叫。An entry is added to back navigation history when either a new navigation occurs, by calling the method, or by navigating to an entry in forward navigation history, by calling . 項目就會加入向前巡覽記錄中，瀏覽至項目後巡覽記錄，藉由呼叫。An entry is added to forward navigation history by navigating to an entry in back navigation history, by calling . 和報告中是否有項目向後和向前巡覽記錄，分別。 and report whether there are entries in backward and forward navigation history, respectively. 第一次，一段內容巡覽至另一段內容，從會自動顯示 巡覽 UI，可讓使用者向後巡覽及巡覽記錄中的轉送。The first time that one piece of content is navigated to from another piece of content, automatically displays a navigation UI that allows users to navigate back and forwards through navigation history. 您可以設定當巡覽 UI 會顯示藉由設定屬性。You can configure when the navigation UI is shown by setting the property. 最新項目後會移除巡覽歷程記錄，請呼叫。The most recent entry in back navigation history can be removed by calling . 不會儲存在巡覽記錄中的內容物件的執行個體。 does not store an instance of a content object in navigation history. 相反地，巡覽至使用巡覽記錄每次會建立內容物件的新執行個體。Instead, creates a new instance of the content object each time it is navigated to by using navigation history. 此行為被設計來巡覽大量內容時，避免過多的記憶體耗用量。This behavior is designed to avoid excessive memory consumption when large numbers and large pieces of content are being navigated to. 因此，內容的狀態並不會記住從一個瀏覽至下一步。Consequently, the state of the content is not remembered from one navigation to the next. 不過，WPF 提供數種技術，供您可以儲存一種狀態一段內容巡覽記錄中。However, WPF provides several techniques by which you can store a piece of state for a piece of content in navigation history. 使用，您也可以記住多組的單一頁面的執行個體的狀態。Using , you can also remember multiple sets of state for a single page instance. 是其中兩個導覽器，在 WPF 中，其他正在。 is one of two navigators in WPF, the other being . 基本上，導覽器 是一個類別支援瀏覽和巡覽歷程記錄。Essentially, navigator is a class supports navigation and navigation history. 在視覺上，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)]使用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]為導覽器中，以提供整合式的使用者體驗。Visually, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] use [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] as a navigator, to provide an integrated user experience. 不過，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)]實際使用作為 [導覽];屬性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)]中執行[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]會傳回參考，及瀏覽歷程記錄是由由管理的瀏覽歷程記錄與整合[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]。However, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] actually use as the navigator; the property of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)] running in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] will return a reference to the , and the navigation history that is managed by the is integrated with the navigation history that is managed by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]. **內容模型：** 是，這表示可以包含內容，例如文字、 影像或面板。**Content Model:** is a , which means that can contain content such as text, images, or panels. 此外，是根元素，因此，不能屬於另一個項目的內容。Also, is a root element and, consequently, cannot be part of another element's content. 如需有關的內容模型，請參閱 < [WPF 內容模型](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/wpf-content-model.md)。For more information about the content model for , see [WPF Content Model](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/wpf-content-model.md). ## 自訂 NavigationWindow 控制項Customizing the NavigationWindow Control 若要將相同的屬性設定套用至多個控制項，可使用屬性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改預設，讓控制項的獨特的外觀。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 如需有關建立，請參閱 < [ 透過建立 ControlTemplate 自訂現有控制項的外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的組件和狀態所特有，請參閱 < [NavigationWindow 樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/navigationwindow-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [NavigationWindow Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/navigationwindow-styles-and-templates.md). 此控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值，當控制項出現在應用程式。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式會決定由哪一個桌面佈景主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 預設 WPF 佈景主題](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只能影響該屬性是否都存在於控制項的預設範本，並設定使用。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 您可以找到的視覺化屬性清單中的 「 變更視覺結構的控制項 」 一節[透過建立 ControlTemplate 自訂現有控制項的外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何建立 。The following example shows how to create a . summary.span: 在開始巡覽內容片段時發生，如果需要的片段位在目前的內容中，則會立即發生，如果需要的片段位在不同的內容中，則會在載入來源 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] 內容之後發生。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SandboxExternalContent { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.SandboxExternalContent : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，該值表示 是否要在部分信任安全性沙箱內 (具有預設網際網路區域使用權限集合) 隔離外部[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 內容。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a isolates external [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] content within a partial trust security sandbox (with default Internet zone permission set).

value.span: 如果要在部分信任安全性沙箱中將內容隔離，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if content is isolated within a partial trust security sandbox; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 外部內容[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]不會包含應用程式的資源檔或內容檔案的內容 (如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [WPF 應用程式資源、 內容和資料檔案](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md))。External content is [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] content that is not included with an application as either a resource file or a content file (for more information, see [WPF Application Resource, Content, and Data Files](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md)). 當為 true，且內容是外部[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]檔案內容載入至預設值僅限於在部分信任安全性沙箱，網際網路區域權限集合。When is true, and the content of the is an external [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] file, the content is loaded into a partial trust security sandbox that is limited to the default Internet zone permission set. 此外，外部內容載入不同的處理序。Additionally, the external content is loaded into a separate process. 因此，外部內容隔離，而且也沒有存取應用程式範圍的資源，例如資源字典 (如需詳細資訊，請參閱)。Consequently, the external content becomes isolated and does not have access to application-scope resources, such as resource dictionaries (for more information, see ). > [!NOTE] > 包含外部內容時，才屬性設定為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]外部[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]檔案。 contains external content only when the property is set to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for an external [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] file. 使用提供的內容屬性會被視為內部的內容，以及接下來，是未隔離。 content that is provided using the property is considered internal content and, subsequently, is not isolated. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

exception.span: 當應用程式在部分信任中執行時，就會設定 。

span.span: is set when an application is executing in partial trust.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這`ShouldSerialize`提供方法，因為屬性並沒有簡單的預設值。This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the property does not have a simple default value. 這個方法會指出屬性是否已變更其預設值。This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value. 您通常是呼叫此方法，如果您正在開發的設計工具或是開發您自己的控制項併入。You typically call this method if you are either developing a designer for the or developing your own control incorporating the .

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要協助向後和向前巡覽，會自動顯示 瀏覽 UI。To aid backward and forward navigation, automatically displays a navigation UI. 不論是否發生巡覽的巡覽 UI 隨即出現。The navigation UI is displayed whether or not navigation has occurred. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
